title: Coriander houmous
description: Try coriander houmous for a zesty twist on the classic dip recipe. This versatile vegan houmous is perfect for spreading in sandwiches, serving with crudites or as part of a mezze platter.
ingredients: Bunch of fresh coriander, roughly chopped
Finely grated zest and juice of 1 lemon

method.Step 1: In a food processor, whizz the chickpeas, tahini, coriander, garlic and lemon zest and juice to a coarse mix. With the food processor still running, slowly pour in the olive oil until a smooth, thick paste is formed, then season. If the houmous is too thick, add a little water to loosen. Spoon into a bowl and serve with toasted flatbreads for dipping.
